title: Want a Google Translate alternative? Try ChatGPT's new AI tool - it's free and has a twist
contentSnippet: ChatGPT Translate is a separate tool. It's not multimodal yet, but it does let you refine clarity, tone, and intent. Here's how.
content: ChatGPT Translate is a separate tool. It's not multimodal yet, but it does let you refine clarity, tone, and intent. Here's how.
